title: Gusto! is opening new location in DeKalb
title_page: Gusto! is opening new location in DeKalb
text:
The restaurant chain gusto!, known for its wraps and creative “bowls,” is opening a location in DeKalb County.
The location will be at the corner of Church Street and North Decatur Road near DeKalb Medical Center, the chain announced this week. It is expected to open in late September.
The chain so far has restaurants in the Buckhead and Virginia-Highland neighborhoods of Atlanta and a third opening in west Midtown this fall.
The DeKalb location is just outside the city of Decatur.
